name: Meloetta
author: nagimiso
flavor_text: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feels of those who hear it.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Miracle Harmony
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each of your Pokémon in play that has the Sing attack. This attack does 10 damage for each heads to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
